name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max is the latest and largest smartphone from Apple, featuring a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, improved cameras, and longer battery life.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a high-end Android smartphone with a big and bright 6.8-inch AMOLED display, powerful Exynos 2100 or Snapdragon 888 processor, and versatile camera system with up to 100x zoom.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7+
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 7+ is a 2-in-1 laptop and tablet that runs Windows 10, features a 12.3-inch touch display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and optional 4G LTE connectivity.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: The Apple AirPods Pro are premium wireless earbuds that offer active noise cancellation, transparent mode, and improved sound quality compared to the standard AirPods.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2
description: The DJI Mavic Air 2 is a compact and powerful drone that can capture 4K video and 48-megapixel photos with its Hasselblad camera, fly for up to 34 minutes, and reach speeds of up to 42.5 mph.

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is a high-end Android smartphone with a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, powerful Google Tensor SoC, and innovative camera system with features such as Night Sight and Portrait Mode.

name: Nintendo Switch Pro
description: The Nintendo Switch Pro is a hybrid gaming console that can be played as a home console or handheld device, with a large and bright 7-inch OLED display, improved battery life, and Joy-Con controllers with motion controls.

name: Google Nest Hub Max
description: The Google Nest Hub Max is a smart display that combines a 10-inch touch screen, built-in Google Assistant, and a camera with features such as Face Match and Duo video calling.

name: Amazon Echo Show 10
description: The Amazon Echo Show 10 is a smart display with a 10.1-inch touch screen, built-in Alexa, and a motorized base that automatically keeps the screen facing you as you move.

name: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
description: The Raspberry Pi 4 Model B is a credit-card sized computer that can be used for a variety of purposes, such as building a media center, coding, or creating projects with the Internet of Things (IoT).

name: Tesla Model 3
description: The Tesla Model 3 is a all-electric sedan that offers exceptional range, performance, and safety, as well as a minimalist and futuristic interior design.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II are wireless noise-cancelling headphones that provide excellent sound quality and comfortable fit, along with Alexa and Google Assistant voice control.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 are premium wireless noise-cancelling headphones that offer best-in-class sound quality, noise cancellation, and comfortable fit, along with features such as Adaptive Sound Control and Speak-to-Chat.

name: DJI Mini 2
description: The DJI Mini 2 is a small and affordable drone that can capture 2.7K video and 12-megapixel photos with its 3-axis gimbal camera, fly for up to 31 minutes, and reach speeds of up to 42.7 mph.
